biocontainers.name: minirmd
biocontainers.summary: minirmd is a tool to remove duplicate reads. The program is written in C++11 (tested with g++ >= 5.4.0) and works on Linux.

biotools.summary: Minirmd is a tool to fast remove duplicate reads.

bioschemas.name: Minirmd
bioschemas.summary: Minirmd is a tool to fast remove duplicate reads.
